languages.text: "Ответ неизвестен. Я... фиксирую сродство, не только идентификационное, но и более глубинное. Архимагос Амарнат оставлял отпечаток себя в каждом, кого наставлял — возможно, в технобрате Авеле я вижу своего владыку, и оттого дух мой ликует и преисполняется радения о нем".

"Answer unknown. I am... registering a kinship, both between our identifiers and one that is more profound. Archmagos Amarnat left an imprint on all his students. It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."
languages.original_text: "Ответ неизвестен. Я... фиксирую сродство, не только идентификационное, но и более глубинное. Архимагос Амарнат оставлял отпечаток себя в каждом, кого наставлял — возможно, в технобрате Авеле я вижу своего владыку, и оттого дух мой ликует и преисполняется радения о нем".

traits.locale_text: "Answer unknown. I am... registering a kinship, both between our identifiers and one that is more profound. Archmagos Amarnat left an imprint on all his students. It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."

It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我也不明白。我……在我们的身份标识之中，以及某种更加深刻的标识之中，检测到了某种亲缘关系。阿玛纳特大贤者在他所有的学徒身上都留下了这样的印记。有可能是因为我在技术兄弟亚伯身上看到了导师的影子，这让我欣喜不已。我愿意努力保护他免受伤害。”
languages.original_text: "Answer unknown. I am... registering a kinship, both between our identifiers and one that is more profound. Archmagos Amarnat left an imprint on all his students. It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."

traits.locale_text: “我也不明白。我……在我们的身份标识之中，以及某种更加深刻的标识之中，发现了某种亲缘关系。阿玛纳特大贤者在他所有的学徒身上都留下了这样的印记。有可能是因为我在技术兄弟亚伯身上看到了导师的影子，这让我欣喜不已。我愿意努力保护他免受伤害。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「回答は不明。自分は…我々の識別子の間により深い親愛というものを登録しています。大賢人アマルナトは全ての子弟に刻印を残された。つまり、技術同胞アベルの中に自分の師が見て取れるかもしれません。それに、自分の精神がそれを喜び、また彼を危害から遠ざけるために尽くそうとしているのです」
languages.original_text: "Answer unknown. I am... registering a kinship, both between our identifiers and one that is more profound. Archmagos Amarnat left an imprint on all his students. It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."

traits.locale_text: 「回答は不明。自分は…我々の識別子の間により深い親愛というものを登録しています。大賢人アマルナトは全ての子弟に刻印を残された。つまり、技術同胞アベルの中に自分の師が見て取れるかもしれません。それに、自分の精神がそれを喜び、また彼を危害から遠ざけるために尽くそうとしているのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Réponse inconnue. J'enregistre... une parenté, qui tient à nos identifiants, mais aussi à quelque chose de plus profond. L'archimagos Amarnat a laissé une empreinte sur tous ses étudiants. Dans ce cas, il se peut que je perçoive un peu de mon mentor dans le technofrère Abel et que mon esprit se réjouisse et s'efforce de le protéger. »
languages.original_text: "Answer unknown. I am... registering a kinship, both between our identifiers and one that is more profound. Archmagos Amarnat left an imprint on all his students. It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."

traits.locale_text: « Réponse inconnue. J'enregistre... une parenté, qui tient à nos identifiants, mais aussi à quelque chose de plus profond. L'archimagos Amarnat a laissé une empreinte sur tous ses étudiants. Dans ce cas, il se peut que je perçoive un peu de mon mentor dans le technofrère Abel et que mon esprit se réjouisse et s'efforce de le protéger. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Respuesta desconocida. Detecto cierta... cercanía, tanto entre nuestros identificadores como una más profunda. El Archimagos Amarnat dejó huella en todos sus estudiantes. Es posible que vea a mi mentor en el tecnohermano Abel, y por eso mi espíritu se regocija y siente el deseo de mantenerlo a salvo».
languages.original_text: "Answer unknown. I am... registering a kinship, both between our identifiers and one that is more profound. Archmagos Amarnat left an imprint on all his students. It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."

traits.locale_text: «Respuesta desconocida. Detecto cierta... cercanía, tanto entre nuestros identificadores como una más profunda. El Archimagos Amarnat dejó huella en todos sus estudiantes. Es posible que vea a mi mentor en el tecnohermano Abel, y por eso mi espíritu se regocija y siente el deseo de mantenerlo a salvo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Antwort unbekannt. Ich ... registriere eine Verwandtschaft zwischen unseren IDs, die etwas profunder ist. Erzmagos Amarnat hat allen seinen Studenten seinen Stempel aufgedrückt. Es mag also sein, dass ich etwas von meinem Mentor in Tech-Bruder Abel wiedererkenne. Deshalb strebt mein Geist danach, ihn vor Ungemach zu bewahren."
languages.original_text: "Answer unknown. I am... registering a kinship, both between our identifiers and one that is more profound. Archmagos Amarnat left an imprint on all his students. It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."

traits.locale_text: "Antwort unbekannt. Ich ... registriere eine Verwandtschaft zwischen unseren IDs, die etwas profunder ist. Erzmagos Amarnat hat allen seinen Studenten seinen Stempel aufgedrückt. Es mag also sein, dass ich etwas von meinem Mentor in Tech-Bruder Abel wiedererkenne. Deshalb strebt mein Geist danach, ihn vor Ungemach zu bewahren."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Yanıt bilinmiyor. Hem kimliklerimiz arasında hem de daha içsel bir konuda bir çeşit... Akrabalık kaydediyorum. Başmagos Amarnat, tüm öğrencileri üzerinde iz bırakmıştır. Dolayısıyla Tekno Kardeş Abel'de yönderimin bir yansımasını görüyor olabilirim, ruhum da bundan mutluluk duyup ona zarar gelmesini engellemek istiyor olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Answer unknown. I am... registering a kinship, both between our identifiers and one that is more profound. Archmagos Amarnat left an imprint on all his students. It may be, then, that I see some of my mentor in Tech-Brother Abel, and so my spirit rejoices and strives to keep him from harm."

traits.locale_text: "Yanıt bilinmiyor. Hem tanımlayıcılarımız arasında hem de daha içsel bir konuda bir çeşit... Akrabalık kaydı alıyorum. Başmagos Amarnat, tüm öğrencileri üzerinde bir iz bırakmıştır. Dolayısıyla Tekno Kardeş Abel'de yönderimin bir yansımasını görüyor olabilirim ve ruhum bundan mutluluk duyuyor, ona zarar gelmesini engellemek istiyor olabilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
